timeline.bodyText: Why test1? :) Can we have "proper" name? Like ...-gradle-cache?
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: Somehow I read temp as test and added a 1 expecting to mess up a bucket or two (well technically I messed up one bucket which didn't have a 1 ;) Let's stick with this for now since we'll probably change buckets later anyways.
replies.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: How can you "mess the bucket"? :) You can delete and recreate one, no?
replies.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: It takes a long time to be able to reuse the bucket name. Wasn't ready yet after about 30 min.
replies.author: anuraaga
